info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:37AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Haakon, southwestern Ziebach, southeastern Meade, northwestern Mellette, northeastern Jackson and northeastern Pennington Counties through 515 AM MDT/615 AM CDT/... At 437 AM MDT/537 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Union Center to 4 miles southeast of Grindstone Butte to 2 miles northeast of Belvidere. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Philip, Union Center, Milesville, Midland, Plainview, Enning, Belvidere, Grindstone, Ottumwa, Creighton, Marcus, Bridger, Howes, White Owl, Billsburg, Takini, Grindstone Butte and Nowlin. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 158 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
